instructions: Image titled Listen to Skype Voice Messages on Android Step 1 1 Open the Skype app on your Android. The Skype icon looks like a white "S" in a blue circle. You can find it on your Apps menu. If you're not automatically signed in to Skype, enter your Skype name, email or phone, and your password to log in. Image titled Listen to Skype Voice Messages on Android Step 2 2 Tap the tab. This button is located below your profile picture at the top of your screen. It will open a list of all your recent personal and group chats. Image titled Listen to Skype Voice Messages on Android Step 3 3 Tap your contact's name. Find your contact on the Chats list who left you a voice message, and open the conversation. Image titled Listen to Skype Voice Messages on Android Step 4 4 Tap the Play button next to the voice message. The Play button looks like a rightward arrowhead icon. It will play the recorded voice message. Advertisement
